elements.name: anat_preproc/t1_brain_seg
elements.title: Brain mask and brain tissue segmentation of the T1w
elements.description: This panel shows the template T1-weighted image (if several T1w images were found), with contours delineating the detected brain mask and brain tissue segmentations.

elements.name: anat_preproc/t1_2_mni
elements.title: T1 to MNI registration
elements.description: Nonlinear mapping of the T1w image into MNI space. Hover on the panel with the mouse to transition between both spaces.

elements.name: anat_preproc/reconall
elements.title: Surface reconstruction
elements.description: Surfaces (white and pial) reconstructed with FreeSurfer (recon-all) overlaid on the participant's T1w template.

elements.name: fmap/magnitude_mask
elements.title: Skull stripped magnitude image
elements.description: Brain extraction of the magnitude image from the fieldmap

elements.name: epi/fmpa_reg
elements.title: Fieldmap to EPI registration
elements.description: Results of affine coregistration between the magnitude image of the fieldmap and the reference EPI image

elements.name: epi/fmpa_reg
elements.title: Fieldmap
elements.description: Overlaid on the reference EPI image

elements.name: epi/unwarp
elements.title: Susceptibility distortion correction
elements.description: Results of performing susceptibility distortion correction (SDC) on the EPI

elements.name: epi/sdc_syn
elements.title: Experimental fieldmap-less susceptibility distortion correction
elements.description: The dataset contained some fieldmap information, but the argument --force-syn was used. The higher-priority SDC method was used. Here, we show the results of performing SyN-based SDC on the EPI for comparison.

elements.name: epi/rois
elements.title: ROIs in BOLD space
elements.description:
Brain mask calculated on the BOLD signal (red contour), along with the masks used for a/tCompCor.
The aCompCor mask (magenta contour) is a conservative CSF and white-matter mask for extracting physiological and movement confounds.
The fCompCor mask (blue contour) contains the top 5% most variable voxels within a heavily-eroded brain-mask.

elements.name: epi_mean_t1_registration/flirt
elements.title: EPI to T1 registration
elements.description: FLIRT was used to generate transformations from EPI space to T1 Space - BBR refinement rejected

elements.name: epi_mean_t1_registration/coreg
elements.title: EPI to T1 registration
elements.description: mri_coreg (FreeSurfer) was used to generate transformations from EPI space to T1 Space - bbregister refinement rejected

elements.name: epi_mean_t1_registration/flt_bbr
elements.title: EPI to T1 registration
elements.description: FLIRT was used to generate transformations from EPI space to T1 Space - FAST segmentation used for BBR

elements.name: epi_mean_t1_registration/bbr
elements.title: EPI to T1 registration
elements.description: bbregister was used to generate transformations from EPI space to T1 Space

elements.name: ica_aroma
elements.title: ICA AROMA
elements.description: Maps created with maximum intensity projection (glass brain) with a black brain outline. Right hand side of each map: time series (top in seconds), frequency spectrum (bottom in Hertz). Components classified as signal in green; noise in red.
